name: TDshooter(LudumDare41)
description:
Hey Guys, this is my project for Ludum Dare 41.

Browser game was to big to upload it here ;)

Controls:

W,S,A,D - movement

E - zoom in

Q - zoom out

F4- quit game

LeftMB - based on if host or client

HOST:(Tower Defence)

Select turret on right.

Click on red square to spawn turret.

Killing AI -25 money

Killing Player - 75 money

Win when 15 minutes will pass

CLIENTS:(Shooter)

LeftMB - shoot

Win when Host HP is 0

This is a combination Tower Defence + Shooter, for people who want to test it without friends there are two bots walking from start to end ;)

You can play over LAN(LAN Host(H)/LAN Client(C))

Don't use LAN Server Only(S) it will now work    :D

You can also play over internet using Match Maker but it is slow connection so there can be some bugs.

Game is free just press "No thanks, just take me to the downloads"
